sentences.en: 1,654 passengers were transferred at sea to a Norwegian cruise ship.
sentences.cn: 1,654名乘客在海上转搭了一艘挪威游轮。

sentences.en: A Norwegian, Roald Amundsen , had also set his sight on the Pole.
sentences.cn: 挪威人罗德.阿蒙森也把眼光放在南极.

sentences.en: But this year the focus should be on the wilds of the Norwegian countryside.
sentences.cn: 但今年我们不妨将目光转向挪威的乡村自然美景。

sentences.en: Ethnic Composition : Norwegian ( Germanic ) 95 %, with a Sami minority of about 20, 000 people.
sentences.cn: 民族:日 耳曼族挪威人占95%北部有萨米族约2万人.

sentences.en: I read the book in translation, not in the original Norwegian.
sentences.cn: 这本书我读的是译本, 不是挪威文原著.

sentences.en: I stood there breathing in the fresh Norwegian air.
sentences.cn: 我站在那儿呼吸着挪威新鲜的空气。

sentences.en: It is interesting that Grainger spoke Norwegian.
sentences.cn: 真有趣，格兰杰讲挪威语。

sentences.en: Norwegian Anna, always dignified, looked at her reprovingly.
sentences.cn: 一向态度威严的挪威人安娜用责备的眼光望望她.

sentences.en: Norwegian scientists have analysed samples from more than 70 patients with clinical illness and no further instances of this mutation have been detected.
sentences.cn: 挪威科学家对从70多名临床疾病患者身上采集的标本作了分析，未发现更多的此类变异情况。

sentences.en: Norwegian whalers said yesterday they had harpooned a female minke whale.
sentences.cn: 挪威的捕鲸人说昨天他们用捕鲸叉捕获了一头雌性小须鲸。

sentences.en: She showed me her room , isn't it good, norwegian wood?
sentences.cn: 她把我带到了她家,很棒, 不是吗? 挪威的森林?

sentences.en: She showed me her room, isn & quot; t it good, norwegian wood?
sentences.cn: 她带我看她的房间, “很不错吧, 就像挪威的森林? ”

sentences.en: The itinerary from north to south is a compendium of Norwegian nature.
sentences.cn: 从北到南可以领略到挪威自然的概貌.

sentences.en: The main road from Murmansk to the Norwegian border is still closed to foreigners.
sentences.cn: 从摩尔曼斯克到挪威边界的主路仍对外国人关闭。

sentences.en: The Norwegian Elkhound is a hardy gray hunting dog.
sentences.cn: 挪威猎麋犬是一种勇敢的灰色猎犬.

sentences.en: The Norwegian Embassy in Damascus was set ablaze Saturday.
sentences.cn: 挪威驻大马士革大使馆星期六被点燃.

sentences.en: The titular song ‘Norwegian Wood’ sings, ‘I once had a girl, or should I say she once had me.
sentences.cn: 主题曲‘挪威的森林’里唱着‘我曾经拥有过一个女孩，或许该说她曾经拥有过我’。

sentences.en: Tired of risking more Norwegian lives, he also attempted suicide.
sentences.cn: 为了不让更多的挪威人来为他冒生命危险, 他甚至还试图自杀.

words.tran_cn: 挪威的；挪威人的；挪威语的

trans.tran_cn: 挪威人的，挪威的，挪威语的
trans.tran_en: Norwegian means belonging or relating to Norway, or to its people, language, or culture
A Norwegian is a person who comes from Norway
